name: Space Puncher
description:
Punch your way to the top!

Controls:

A/D - Walk

Spacebar - Jump

Any mouse button - Punch

360 Controller supported!

Did you get an unusually high score? Tell me so on twitter!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 30: http://www.ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-30/?action=preview&uid=15287
